document_data.name: Elowen
document_data.mainbody: '''Elowen''' was a [[Nentyar hunter]] operating in the [[Forest of Lethyr]] in {{yearlink|1373}}. She was a part of [[Araluen]]'s party when she went to confront the [[Rotting Man]] that year.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|125-127|13}}
document_data.Description: Elowen clad herself in warrior's garb,{{cite book/Lady of Poison|28|4}} mostly brown and green leathers. Her hair hid her ears; her build was thin and elongated.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|30|4}}
document_data.Personality: She was strongly appreciative of music, even very foreign one like that of [[Gunggari Ulmarra]].{{cite book/Lady of Poison|44-45|5}} Also, she really liked swords.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|132|14}}
document_data.Abilities: Elowen was quite familiar with the paths around the [[Forest of Lethyr]],{{cite book/Lady of Poison|41|5}} and even with parts of the Rawlinswood like the [[Arches of Xenosi]].
document_data.Possessions: The [[Nentyarch]] bestowed ''[[Dymondheart]]'' upon Elowen before sending her on the quest to confront the [[Rotting Man]] together with [[Araluen]]. Before that time, she wielded a leaf-shaped blade.
document_data.Activities: As a [[Nentyar hunter]], Elowen ranged freely throughout the Forest of Lethyr.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|43-44|5}} She was, however, quite remiss with her paperwork; in {{yearlink|1373}}, she had gone for about two years without reporting back to the Circle of Leth.
document_data.Relationships: Her fellow [[Nentyar hunter]] [[Fallon]] bore some sort of grudge against her.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|108|12}} She was friends with the [[Deep Imaskari]] [[wizard]] [[Ususi Manaallin]]. She slowly became friends with [[Marrec]] and [[Gunggari Ulmarra]] over the course of their time together.
